data.title: Choose the correct answer for each question

sections.explain: Correct usage of the word 'write' in a sentence.

words.word: Please write your name here.
Please right your name here.
Please rite your name here.

sections.explain: Correct usage of the word 'right' in a sentence.

words.word: Turn right at the next corner.
Turn write at the next corner.
Turn rite at the next corner.

sections.explain: Correct usage of the word 'rite' in a sentence.

words.word: The tribe performed a sacred rite.
The tribe performed a sacred right.
The tribe performed a sacred write.

sections.explain: Correct usage of the word 'capital' in a sentence.

words.word: Paris is the capital of France.
Paris is the capitol of France.
Paris is the cattle of France.

sections.explain: Correct usage of the word 'capitol' in a sentence.

words.word: The capitol building was surrounded by tourists.
The capital building was surrounded by tourists.
The cattle building was surrounded by tourists.

sections.explain: Correct usage of the word 'cattle' in a sentence.

words.word: The farmer owns many cattle on his ranch.
The farmer owns many capital on his ranch.
The farmer owns many capitol on his ranch.

sections.explain: Correct usage of the word 'vain' in a sentence.

words.word: She is too vain about her looks.
She is too vein about her looks.
She is too vane about her looks.

sections.explain: Correct usage of the word 'vein' in a sentence.

words.word: The nurse found a vein to insert the needle.
The nurse found a vain to insert the needle.
The nurse found a vane to insert the needle.

sections.explain: Correct usage of the word 'vane' in a sentence.

words.word: The wind vane shows which direction the wind blows.
The wind vein shows which direction the wind blows.
The wind vain shows which direction the wind blows.
